downloadTitle: Microsoft RMS SDK 3.0 for OS X
downloadDescription: Microsoft RMS SDK 3.0  for OS X is a simple SDK for RMS for supporting a lightweight developer experience in creating rights-enabled device applications. By downloading the software, you agree to the license terms provided for the software. If you do not agree to the license terms, do not download the software.
detailsSection:
Microsoft RMS SDK 3.0  for OS X is a simple SDK for RMS for supporting a lightweight developer experience in creating rights-enabled device applications.

Microsoft RMS SDK 3.0 provides the following top features:
• Integration with Windows Azure Active Directory Rights Management (AADRM)
• Generic Protection support built right into the SDK APIs
• Provides best in class protection and consumption UI
 
By downloading the software, you agree to the license terms provided for the software. If you do not agree to the license terms, do not download the software.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System - Mac OS X 10.7 or above.

Xcode 4.5. 
If you are new to OS X development, you will need the Xcode development tool set. It is available through the Mac App Store.
installInstructionSection: Getting started guide is available here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dn223672(v=vs.85).aspx
